devdoc.author: Scaffold-ETH 2
devdoc.details: A contract for issuing non-transferable (soulbound) educational certificates as tokens

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

approveCertificate(uint256).details: Allows a student to approve their certificate

params.tokenId: The ID of the certificate to approve

getCertificatesByStudent(address).details: Gets all certificates owned by a student

getTotalCertificates().details: Gets the total number of certificates issued

issueCertificate(address,string,string,u.details: Issues a new certificate to a student

params.documentURI: The IPFS URI of the certificate document
params.universityName: The name of the issuing university

returns._0: The ID of the newly issued certificate

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

revokeCertificate(uint256).details: Allows the contract owner to revoke a certificate

params.tokenId: The ID of the certificate to revoke

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.documentURI: The updated IPFS URI of the certificate document
params.skills: The updated array of skills acquired
params.studentName: The updated name of the student
params.tokenId: The ID of the certificate to update
params.universityName: The updated name of the issuing university

devdoc.title: Certificate
